blogs.title: The Lunarians Will Pay With Their Blood
blogs.text: They killed my son. They killed him in cold blood and nothing will bring my poor son back to me. The lunarians will pay with their blood! I will use the ears of the lunarian rabbits to decorate my living room. I torture chang'e everyday and make her regret killing my son. The lunarians will pay for what they did.. That general sagume will not get away from my rage as well
blogs.author: Junko

blogs.title: Green tea and its health benefits
blogs.text: Green tea üçµ besides being an important tradition in the Hakurei family and in Japan as a whole also has a ton of health benefits. In this blog we are going to discuss the health benefits of tea and how to prepare simple green tea.
